title: Senior Software Engineer at Walmart
body: During this time I led the design and development of a web-based AutoCAD solution to create space design floor maps for Walmart retail stores. Developed plugins for the Desktop AutoCAD applications.Coordinated system changes across teams with thorough testing and validation. Played an integral role in designing a high-performance, efficient, and robust backend and an attractive UI for AutoCAD. Architected the UI workflow for the web-based AutoCAD application, utilizing extensive JavaScript for a responsive and fast user interface. Spearheaded the migration of the entire product to Blazor UI and supported the JDA Floor Planning CKB application, integrating it with external APIs for data export.Created and modifed the functionality for the Canvas and SVG for UI.Utilized skills like SQL, Git, REST,SignalR, React, Blazor, JIRA

title: Software Engineer at SITA
body: During this time I Developed software solutions for airlines and airports. Created a client-server check-in & boarding application for airlines.During this project I contributed in Frontend and Backend development and managed various global production servers. Led and mentored a team of two engineers, implementing scalable micro-services for the product. Collaborated closely with UI/UX, product, and operations teams for design and POC approvals.Led the Documentless Travel and Timatic project for the Australian and US governments, which made travel smooth and hassle-free during COVID-19 using facial recognition. This product helped the company gain new airports as clients, including SFO, LA, Bangalore Airport, Mumbai Airport, and others.

title: Software Engineer at Goodwill
body: During this time I worked on numerious projects like Point of Sale, Task Scheduler (Android App), Email Router,Ad Campaign,SharePoint applications. Worked on different analytic tools like POWERBI, SSRS,SSIS, for development and analysis of reports. Building and maintaining eCommerce website application for company.

title: Software Engineer at Cleveland Clinic
body: During this time I worked on Maintenance and configuration Cleveland Clinic website functionality and database. Designing & Developing healthcare applications for company. Have worked on multiple projects like MyConsult, Windows Authentication,MapApp, File Transfer, etc. Performing data analytics on company website using different analytic tools. Learnt how to understand the business workflow and use it building useful data tools. Perform SEO analysis and resolve crawl errors.

title: Systems Analyst at Infosys
body: During this time I worked with the British telecomm Account project , where I worked migrating platform and setting up CICD pipeline.Created different reports using SSRS, PowerBI, and managened logging using ELK stack.

title: Software Engineer at Schneider
body: Maintenance and configuration of company website and production database. Updating frequent changes to front-end and backend as needed. Designed database architecture and developed database. Technical support and troubleshooting. Developing Web Application for different clients based on requirements of Control panels.
